item.title: Title, Message and Buttons
item.description: Title, Message and Buttons # As a powerful ⚡️ UI component that can display a variety of different styles, we definitely don’t want to just use the default configuration, so here we start with three basic configurations: title, message and buttons. Title # Let’s start with the title. textbox({ title: 'Hello', }); TRY Did you see it? The title ‘Hello’ appears in the title bar, let’s turn it to red:
